title: **JUST LISTED**  Remodeled Penthouse Studio
posting_body: Proudly offered by Bay Apartment Advisors
This renovated unit is situated in the Gold Coast neighborhood of Oakland, close to downtown and Lake Merritt.
This is a penthouse unit with updated stainless appliances, new floors, and fresh paint.
With convenient freeway access and BART access, you can be in San Francisco and other parts of the Bay in minutes.
**Please read entire ad before emailing questions.
- Recently Painted Hallways and Common Areas, exterior paint
- Highly desirable location, close to restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, nightlife, fun.
- A ton of closet space and great Natural Lighting!
- Close to 12th Lake Merritt BART, Downtown Oakland, and Lake Merritt.
• Pets - No Pets (Cats with an additional deposit)
Rental listings subject to change at any time.
